ValidationRule.description: If What is your request related to is Academy then Request Sub Category is mandatory for internal users
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL( What_is_your_request_related_to__c ,"Academy"), ISPICKVAL( Request_Sub_Category__c , ""), ISPICKVAL( $User.UserType , "Standard"), RecordType.DeveloperName == "Academy", !ISNEW() , ISPICKVAL( Status , "Closed")
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the Request Sub Category.
